taskDefinition.name: Kinetic Request CE Retrieve
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Retrieves the specified information for the specified item.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Type of Record to Retrieve
parameter.tooltip: Type of record you want to retrieve. Valid Values are: Space, Kapp, Bridge, Bridge Model, Categories, Form, Form Type, Team, User, Webhook.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Please Specify the Kapp if retrieving Submission, Form, Form Type, or Categories

parameter.label: Item Name or Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug (or name if slug not appropriate for the item) of the item you are retrieving.

parameter.label: Includes
parameter.tooltip: Specify which data to include. Valid values vary by item.
